mapper.insert: insert into user(name, password, full_name, class_taken, fun_stuff, other_stuff, links) values (#{name},#{password},#{fullName},#{classTaken},#{funStuff},#{otherStuff},#{links})
mapper.update: update users set full_name = #{fullName}, class_taken = #{classTaken}, fun_stuff = #{funStuff}, other_stuff = #{otherStuff}, links = #{links} where id = #{id}
